name: Nutrition DeJunked
address: Rexburg, ID (Virtual sessions available statewide and in Oregon, Montana, and Florida)
description: Offers compassionate and personalized nutrition counseling for individuals of all ages facing challenges related to disordered eating and health. name: Health Loft
